channel.title: FLF - Liberty Dispatch
channel.description: FIGHT LAUGH FEAST PRESENTS SHOWS PROCLAIMING THE LORDSHIP OF CHRIST OVER ALL OF LIFE.
channel.itunes:author: FLF, LLC

item.title: A Tale of Two Protests: A March for Life and an Occupation for Death [Liberty Dispatch]
item.description:
Liberty Dispatch ~ May 16, 2024
On this episode of Liberty Dispatch, hosts Andrew and Matthew juxtapose two different protest movements the Pro-life March 4 Life, and the pro-terrorist Pro-Palestinian occupation taking place on campuses all over the country and around the globe. Let's just say, you'll know them by their fruits. 

Episode Resources:
"Thousands of Pro-Lifers Gather in Ottawa for Canada's Annual March for Life" | LifeSiteNews https://www.lifesitenews.com/news/thousands-of-pro-lifers-gather-in-ottawa-for-canadas-annual-march-for-life
Jagmeet Singh on Twitter: https://twitter.com/theJagmeetSingh/status/1788705817685848459; 
Chrystia Freeland on Twitter: https://twitter.com/cafreeland/status/1788634224850788792; 
Mark Gerretsen on Twitter: https://twitter.com/MarkGerretsen/status/1788678329131835749; 
"Anti-Israel Occupation" | True North https://tnc.news/2024/05/06/rhf-anti-israel-occupation
